list.title: Component#buildChildTag
list.description: Builds a child tag based on a detector attribute.

list.title: Component#buildSentence
list.description: Builds a sentence with optional rendering and minification.

list.title: Component#buildTag
list.description: Builds a tag with the given parameters and options.

list.title: Component#buildUrl
list.description: Builds a URL with the given parameters.

list.title: Component#getBuilder
list.description: Retrieves a builder class or instance for a specific method.

list.title: Component#getMethod
list.description: Determines the method to use based on the provided parameters.

list.title: Component#iconAttr
list.description: Processes icon-related attributes and appends them to the HTML.

list.title: Component#loadBaseFactories
list.description: Loads base factories dynamically from the file system.

list.title: Component#normalizeAttr
list.description: Normalizes the attributes of the given parameters.

list.title: Component#render
list.description: Renders the final HTML for the given parameters.
